name: Super Red-Hot Hero
storyline:
Escaped super soldier project, Super Red-Hot Hero, is being chased by the TV robot minions of the Kazan Army. The villainous King Kazan and his top scientist Dr. Professor will stop at nothing to capture their prized test subject.

Upgrade your shields and collect precious Red-Hot energy cells to prolong your life and defeat the Kazan Army to reclaim your home and become your island's true hero!

Super Red-Hot Hero comes with over 30 fast-paced levels loaded with creative enemies, brain-teasing puzzles, collectibles, and time trial modes for skilled, speedrunnnig players.
summary: Super Red-Hot Hero is a frenzied action-platformer, indie game inspired by Super Mario Bros., Super Meat Boy and Mega Man. Teleport through Red-Hot Energy at the speed of light, punching and shooting the TV robot forces of the Kazan Army in your path to save your island!
